item.title: By: Damien Heffernan
item.dc:creator: Damien Heffernan
item.description:
Hi,
I am not sure if Im on the right blog but I have a question-Is there any hope in starting a buisness with a good idea without having funding? Probably not but any thoughts would be appreciated.
Kind regards, Damien Heffernan,
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I am not sure if Im on the right blog but I have a question-Is there any hope in starting a buisness with a good idea without having funding? Probably not but any thoughts would be appreciated.

Kind regards,
Damien Heffernan,

item.title: By: Ger Hartnett
item.dc:creator: Ger Hartnett
item.description:
LEAP is a year long milestone driven enterprise and management development programme hosted by the Enterprise Acceleration Centre @ Limerick Institute of Technology. Details at: http://leap.ie/
You can find out more about the application process at: http://leap.ie/apply_process.php
item.content:encoded:
LEAP is a year long milestone driven enterprise and management development programme hosted by the Enterprise Acceleration Centre @ Limerick Institute of Technology. Details at: http://leap.ie/
